field.help: The external FQDN of this host.

field.label: Source IP
field.help: Originate all traffic from this IP

field.label: IPv6 Source
field.help: Originate all IPv6 traffic from this IP

field.label: Nickname
field.help: This may only consist of characters and numbers and is used to identifiy your host.

field.label: Contact Info
field.help: You can enter a publicly visible (obfuscated) email address into this field to allow other users to notify you if there are issues with your relay.

field.label: Show Directory Frontpage
field.help: Upload a HTML file to /usr/local/etc/tor/exit-notice.html before enabling this to serve a directory frontpage.

field.label: Bridge
field.help: A bridge is a private relay. It is not visible in the public directory. Uncheck this if you want to become a public relay.

field.label: Reject Private IPs
field.help: Reject exiting to private IP space
